text: On a train to Frankfurt, where we'll overnight before flying on to DFW tomorrow morning. Hooray for vacation!

text: Good lunch with @carlo, but I think I overdid it.  First real meal since Wednesday, and now I'm a bit more than stuffed.  Now, to Frankfurt!

text: Wednesday night and Thursday were absolutely miserable.  I've never vomited so much in my life.  Today's slightly better.  Now, back to bed.
